LanguageData.RK_Axe.label: Ratkin axe
LanguageData.RK_Axe.description: It is an ax for cutting trees. It is a little small, but it will help to cut.
LanguageData.RK_Axe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.RK_Axe.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.label: Ratkin cleaver
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.description: It is a knife for cutting meat. Get more meat. It does not seem to be a good weapon.
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.label: Ratkin hoe
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.description: It is a plow for the field. It is easy to dig the ground.
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Fork.label: Ratkin fork
LanguageData.RK_Fork.description: A fork-shaped insert with a split end. It is convenient when pile straw.
LanguageData.RK_Fork.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_Fork.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.label: Ratkin longSword
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.description: It is the sword of the Guardener who keeps the field. It is good to take care of garden or your enemy.
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.label: Ratkin cross bow
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.description: It is a simple crossbow. It is used when hunting.
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.tools.1.label: arrow
LanguageData.Bolt_RK_Crossbow.label: crossbow bolt
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.label: Ratkin enhanced cross bow
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.description: Improved crossbow. It goes farther and has excellent penetration.
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.tools.1.label: arrow
LanguageData.Bolt_RK_EnhanceCrossBow.label: crossbow bolt
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.label: Ratkin autocross bow
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.description: Semi-automatic crossbow that is fired mechanically. You can fire bolts at high speed from a round magazine.
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.tools.1.label: arrow
LanguageData.Bolt_RK_AutoCrossBow.label: crossbow bolt
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.label: Ratkin rifle
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.description: It is a rifle imitating a human rifle. It is longer than the crossbow. There is a bayonet, so you can have close combat.
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_Rifle.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.label: Ratkin sniper rifle
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.description: It is a rifle with a ratkin style telescopic sight. Can aim farther, but it is harder to aim nearby.
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_SniperRifle.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.label: Ratkin flechette rifle
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.description: It is a rifle using Flechette. It increased penetration by sacrificing range. It have bayonets for melee combat.
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.tools.2.label: flechette
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_FlechetteRifle.label: flechette
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.label: Ratkin flechette sniper rifle
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.description: It is a rifle with a telescopic sight using Flechette. It can penetrate a long armor in a long distance. It have bayonets for melee combat.
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.tools.2.label: flechette
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.label: flechette
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.label: Ratkin prototype pulse rifle
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.description: Experimental energy rifle. Made for experimental Ratkins. Special sights have been added to improve near and far sighting. This weapon, inspired by the Ratkin Flechette bullet, fires a wedge-shaped, high-penetration energy projectile.
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.verbs.0.label: Rapid Fire
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.verbs.1.label: Precisely Fire
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_PrototypePulseRifleLight.label: wedge bullet
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_PrototypePulseRifleHeavy.label: wedge bullet
LanguageData.RK_BFR.label: BFR 3000
LanguageData.RK_BFR.verbs.0.label: AP fire
LanguageData.RK_BFR.verbs.1.label: SC fire
LanguageData.RK_BFR.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_BFR.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BFR_AP.label: wedge bullet (AP)
LanguageData.Bullet_BFR_SC.label: wedge bullet (SC)
